New Records: India took an unassailable lead in the three-match T20I series
Key Match Events: The Indian team restricted the Bangladeshi team to a score of 135/9
Nitish Kumar Reddy struck twice, picking up wickets of Mahmudullah and Tanzim Hasan Sakib
Hardik Pandya took a splendid catch to dismiss Rishad Hossain
Mayank Yadav struck, removing Jaker Ali
Riyan Parag struck, removing Mehidy Hasan Miraz
Pre-Game Insights: India were favourites to win the match but did not take Bangladesh lightly
Bangladesh captain Najmul Hossain Shanto had slammed his team for not being able to score even 180 runs in the first match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi
Suryakumar Yadav and his men had a flying start to the IND vs BAN T20I series, beating Bangladesh comprehensively by seven wickets
